## CrudRepository.create() method

Create a new record

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create(dataObject: DataObject<T>, options?: Options): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataObject | <code>DataObject&lt;T&gt;</code> | The data to be created |
|  options | <code>Options</code> | Options for the operations |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<T>`
